subject: Supporting documentation required for your finance application for your Howdens purchase

rows.text: Your finance application has been reviewed by the lender and they require some additional information / documents from you. You will have received an email from {{lender.contact_email}}. Please follow the link in the email to submit your documents or email them to the lender. We recommend checking your spam folder if you have not received this.

rows.subtext: For finance queries please email Kanda at support@kanda.co.uk or call us on 0330 808 3911. For order queries, please email {{extras.branch.contact_email}} or call {{extras.branch.contact_phone}}.

sms: Hey {{receiver.contact_name}}, good news! The lender has accepted your application in principal. They just need a few documents. Check your email for more info. Kanda!
